name: @dxworks/cli
description: A cli utility for developing and using dxworks projects
author: Mario Rivis <mario.rivis@gmail.com>

scripts.start:voyenv:install: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --exec 'ts-node' src/index.ts voyenv install
scripts.start:voyenv:instrument: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --exec 'ts-node' src/index.ts voyenv instrument
scripts.start:dev:validate: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --exec 'ts-node' src/index.ts dev validate test.manifest.yml
scripts.start:dev:validate-fix: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --exec 'ts-node' src/index.ts dev validate --fix test.manifest.yml
scripts.run:dev:validate-fix: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node dist/index.js dev validate --fix test.manifest.yml
scripts.create: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -p . && npm run copy-files
scripts.local: npm run build && npm i --force && npx dxw --help
